text: [Ej mu'minon] On ciro, ki Alloh taolo ʙa vasilai on ʙarxe az sumoro ʙar ʙarxe digar ʙartari dodaast, orzu makuned [to ducori hasad nasaved]. Mardon az on ci ʙa dast ovardaand, [podosu] ʙahrae dorand va zanon [niz] az on ci ʙa dast ovardaand, [acru] ʙahrae dorand va az ʙaxsisi Alloh taolo [cize] ʙixohed. Be tardid, Alloh taolo ʙa har cize donost
